decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to mill the opponent's library as quickly as possible while controlling the board. Cards like Ruin Crab, Hedron Crab, and Glimpse the Unthinkable help accelerate the milling process, while cards like Drown in the Loch and Fatal Push provide control against threats. Archive Trap can deal massive mill damage if the opponent searches their library, while cards like Tasha's Hideous Laughter and Fractured Sanity further disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck aims to outpace the opponent in milling out their library before they can win through other means.

The deck focuses on utilizing cascade to cast Living End from the graveyard, bringing back powerful creatures while sweeping the board. It includes various creatures with cycling abilities to manipulate the deck and ensure that Living End can be cast reliably. The deck also incorporates control elements with counterspells and disruption like Force of Negation and Sink into Stupor. It aims to overwhelm the opponent with a sudden influx of creatures while maintaining control over the game with its versatile cards.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly disrupt your opponent with discard spells like Thoughtseize and Sink into Stupor while also utilizing low-cost creatures like Death's Shadow and Nethergoyf to apply pressure and close out the game quickly. This aggressive strategy is further reinforced by counterspells like Counterspell and Stubborn Denial to protect your creatures and control the board. The deck also includes efficient removal spells like Fatal Push and Dismember to deal with opposing threats. Overall, the deck aims to be fast-paced and proactive in order to outpace and overwhelm the opponent.

This Mardu Aggro deck focuses on aggressive creature plays and disruption with cards like Thoughtseize and Galvanic Discharge. The companion, Jegantha, provides additional utility to the deck. The deck also includes cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Goblin Bombardment to maintain pressure on the opponent. The mana base is designed to support the aggressive strategy, with a mix of fetch lands and shock lands. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and powerful board presence while disrupting their game plan.

This deck aims to use control elements like Malevolent Rumble and Kozilek's Command in combination with powerful Eldrazi creatures like World Breaker and Emrakul, the Promised End to dominate the game. Cards like Ancient Stirrings and Utopia Sprawl help with consistency and ramp, while cards like Kozilek's Return provide additional removal. The goal is to disrupt the opponent's game plan while building towards big threats that can quickly turn the game in your favor. The mana base is designed to support the Eldrazi creatures and ensure smooth gameplay.

This deck is centered around filling up the graveyard quickly to enable the powerful Hollow One and Detective's Phoenix as early threats. With cards like Goblin Lore and Burning Inquiry, the player can dump cards into the graveyard while also disrupting the opponent's hand. Flameblade Adept and Nethergoyf benefit from cards being discarded, becoming strong attackers. Inti, Seneschal of the Sun provides additional support while Ox of Agonas can refill the hand late game. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells, maintaining pressure throughout the game.

This deck revolves around quickly ramping up mana with Amulet of Vigor and various land cards to cast powerful creatures like Primeval Titan. The goal is to assemble The One Ring combo, which includes specific land cards that can generate a massive amount of mana and deal lethal damage to the opponent in one turn. By using cards like Explore and Arboreal Grazer to accelerate land drops, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and efficient combo finish.

This deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's strategy by controlling the cards they draw and play. It aims to slow down the game by using cards like Lantern of Insight and Codex Shredder to manipulate their library while also preventing attacks with cards like Ensnaring Bridge. The deck also includes cards like Ancient Stirrings and Thoughtseize to search for key pieces and disrupt the opponent's hand. The combination of control elements and disruption makes it difficult for the opponent to execute their game plan effectively.
